price: (A tún ránṣẹ́ sí àwọn) Ƙọ̄rūn, Fir‘aon àti Hāmọ̄n. Dájúdájú (Ànábì) Mūsā mú àwọn ẹ̀rí tó yanjú wá bá wọn. Wọ́n sì ṣègbéraga lórí ilẹ̀. Wọn kò sì lè mórí bọ́ nínú ìyà.
arabic: وَقَٰرُونَ وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَۖ وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مُّوسَىٰ بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كَانُواْ سَٰبِقِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqārūna wafir'ʿawna wahāmāna walaqad jāahum mūsā bil-bayināti fa-is'takbarū fī al-arḍi wamā kānū sābiqīna
